snippet: LEAD: The vibrant prosperity of California has drawn and rewarded many waves of migrants, both American and foreign, but some see a gloomy alternative prospect if more is not done to absorb the state's fast-growing Hispanic work force....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The vibrant prosperity of California has drawn and rewarded many waves of migrants, both American and foreign, but some see a gloomy alternative prospect if more is not done to absorb the state's fast-growing Hispanic work force.

headline.main: Hispanic Growth in California Makes State a Testing Ground

byline.original: By ROBERT REINHOLD, Special to The New York Times
